food_assistance.name: Mid-Day Meal Scheme
food_assistance.description: Free lunch for children in government schools

food_assistance.name: Annapurna Yojana
food_assistance.description: 10 kg of food grains per month for destitute senior citizens
food_assistance.eligibility: Senior citizens not covered under pension schemes

employment_resources.description: 100 days of guaranteed wage employment for rural households

employment_resources.description: Free skill development training for marginalized communities

employment_resources.name: Mudra Yojana

examples: Free up to 200 units in Delhi

utility_assistance.name: Ujjwala Yojana

government_schemes.description: ₹6000 per year direct income support for small farmers
